transcript:
[Ringing]
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Hello? Baat kar rahe ho ya nahi kar rahe ho? Video meet ki baat hui thi. 4 baje na? Haan sir, 5 minute to reh gaye. Vahi to puchh rahi hu. 11 baje to kar lenge na?
Executive: Haan haan, sure.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Main link bhej de rahi hu. 11 baje kya join
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about the video meet at 4 PM.

- Asked about joining at 11 AM.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to the 11 AM meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.

- Customer will send the meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, meeting time, meeting link
